title: Federation Compliance Evidence Mapper
reason: We need this skill because cross-org collaboration fails without shared contracts and trust primitives. This specific skill keeps proof of control coverage continuously current.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Federation Compliance Evidence Mapper`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to integration breakage and trust boundary violations.
Design and version the input/output contract for envelopes, tenant boundaries, and protocol bridges, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using requirement-to-evidence mapping, and produce compliance evidence matrices with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover integration breakage and trust boundary violations, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.

validationGates.check: All required input signals present and schema-valid
Repeated run on same inputs yields stable scoring and artifacts
Approval gates satisfied before publish-level outputs

knownFailures.action: Reject payload, emit validation error, request corrected payload
Freeze output, escalate to human approval router
Apply retry policy then rollback to last stable baseline

produces: Federation Compliance Evidence Mapper normalized artifacts
